name: Bite on This
text: You must discard 1 of your equipped weapons. Ignore the Wound you just received.

name: Blinded
text: Keep this card in front of you until the end of your next Turn. You cannot perform Ranged Attacks. Gain +1 AP per Zombie you kill.

name: Broken Arm
text: Keep this card in front of you until the end of this Mission. You can only have 1 weapon equipped (immediately reorganize your inventory for free). It gains +1 die when used.

name: Damn, You!
text: Immediately perform 1 free All-Out Melee Attack, if possible.

name: Dazed
text: Keep this card in front of you until the end of your next Turn. You can't use any Skills. Gain +1 AP per Zombie you kill.

name: Hey, Over Here!
text: Immediately perform 1 free All-Out Ranged Attack, if possible.

name: Light Wound
text: I'm still good. Let's keep going!

name: Revenge
text: If this Wound was dealt by a Zombie, keep this card in front of your until the end of the next Turn. You can only attack that type of Zombie. Gain +1 AP per Zombie of that type that you kill. If the Wound was dealt by Friendly Fire, the card has no effect.

name: Sprained Ankle
text: Keep this card in front of you until the end of this Mission. You can only perform a Move Action with another Survivor in the Zone you leave or enter and you can't use any movement related Skills. Gain +1 AP per Zombie you kill.

name: Weak Spot
text: If this is your first Wound, suffer 1 extra Wound and gain 5 AP.

text: Polearm.
